languages.text: "Ты про тех несчастных? Да уж, ну и судьба — помереть под рухнувшей дверью..."

traits.locale_text: "Ты про тех несчастных? Да уж, ну и судьба — помереть под рухнувшей дверью..."

languages.text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."
languages.original_text: "Ты про тех несчастных? Да уж, ну и судьба — помереть под рухнувшей дверью..."

traits.locale_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a fallen door..."
"Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a fallen door..."
"Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a fallen door..."
"Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a fallen door..."
"Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."
"Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

languages.text: « À ces pauvres types ? C'est moche, de se faire écrabouiller par une porte effondrée... »
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: « À ces pauvres types ? C'est moche, de se faire écrabouiller par une porte qui tombe... »

languages.text: “那些可怜的家伙？他们真倒霉。门倒了，把他们砸死了……”
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: “那些可怜的家伙？他们真倒霉。门倒了，把他们砸死了……”

languages.text: "Diese armen Leute? Was für ein Pech, von einer umgefallenen totgequetscht zu werden ..."
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: "Diese armen Leute? Was für ein Pech, von einer umgefallenen totgequetscht zu werden ..."

languages.text: «¿Esos pobres desgraciados? Ya es mala suerte morir aplastados por una puerta derrumbada...».
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: «Pobres tipos. Ya es mala suerte morir aplastados por una puerta cayéndose...»

languages.text: 「あの可哀想な奴らの件か？崩れた扉に押しつぶされて死ぬなんて、運が悪いぜ…」
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: 「あの可哀想な奴らの件か？崩れた扉に押しつぶされて死ぬなんて、運が悪いぜ…」

languages.text: "Zavallılar. Yıkılan bir kapının altında kalıp ezilmek de şanssızlığın daniskası."
languages.original_text: "Those poor sods? That's rotten luck, to get crushed to death by a collapsed door..."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallılar. Yıkılan bir kapının altında kalıp ezilmek de şanssızlığın daniskası."
